Package org.apache.flink.spargel.java

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessageIterator<Message>
    An iterator that returns messages.
    MessagingFunction<VertexKey extends Comparable<VertexKey>,VertexValue,Message,EdgeValue>
    The base class for functions that produce messages between vertices as a part of a VertexCentricIteration.
    OutgoingEdge<VertexKey extends Comparable<VertexKey>,EdgeValue>
    Edge objects represent edges between vertices.
    VertexCentricIteration<VertexKey extends Comparable<VertexKey>,VertexValue,Message,EdgeValue>
    This class represents iterative graph computations, programmed in a vertex-centric perspective.
    VertexUpdateFunction<VertexKey extends Comparable<VertexKey>,VertexValue,Message>
    This class must be extended by functions that compute the state of the vertex depending on the old state and the incoming messages.
